case.name: Sleep v Repatriation Commission [2007] FCA 859 (6 June 2007)

citphrases.citphrase: whether amount held by public trustee for investment on behalf of pension recipient is an asset for the purposes of the assets test
whether asset can be disregarded pursuant to s 1118 (1)(n)
finding that paragraph limited to items of physical personal property that are designed to be physically used by the disabled person
an amount of money invested on behalf of the welfare recipient is not designed for use by the person
the amount invested cannot be disregarded as an asset
